title: Romeo and Juliet
description: Let television's canine hero Wishbone be your tour guide!Meet gallant Romeo and beautiful Juliet, whose families have been enemies for generations. In spite of years of hatred, romance is in the air!Secretly, they decide to get married and hide the truth from their parents.Will Romeo and Juliet be able to find true happiness and stop the feud, or are they doomed to a tragic end?
author: Billy Aronson
